p: 'Agents causing yellow fever and dengue which form two closely related virus complexes'-Simians and humans are viremic hosts and Aedes mosquitoes are the vectors. Following are the zoonotic diseases caused by viruses in this complex [ 126]: 1) yellow fever virus (YFV; yellow fever) in Central Africa and South America, 2) dengue virus (DENV) serotypes 1-4 in Asia, Africa, and Central and South America (dengue hemorrhagic fever, dengue shock syndrome), and 3) Wesselsbron fever in Africa.
